message: I'm captain of the Millennium Falcon.
Chewie here told me you're looking for passage to the Alderaan system.

nodes.message: Fast ship? You've never heard of the Millennium Falcon?

message: It's the ship that made the Kessel Run in less than 12 parsecs.
I've outrun Imperial starships, not the local bulk cruisers, mind you. I'm talking about the big Corellian ships now. She's fast enough for you, old man.
What is it? Some kind of local trouble?
Well, that's the real trick, isn't it? And it's going to cost you something extra.
But who's going to fly it kid?
Okay. You guys got yourself a ship.
We'll leave as soon as you're ready.
Yes, Greedo. As a matter of fact, I was just going to see your boss.
Tell Jabba I've got his money.

nodes.message: Yeah, but this time I've got the money.

message: I don't have it with me. Tell Jabba...

nodes.message: Even I get boarded sometimes. You think I had a choice?

message: But I got a nice easy charter now.
I'll pay you back, plus a little extra, I just need a little more time.

edges.label: Only passengers.
message: Only passengers. Myself, the boy, two droids.

edges.label: Imperial entanglements.
edges.message: Let's just say we'd like to avoid any Imperial entanglements.

edges.label: Ten thousand?
message: We could almost buy our own ship for that.

edges.label: Negotiate.
edges.message: We can pay you two thousand now, plus fifteen, when we reach Alderaan.

edges.label: You bet!
message: You bet I could! I'm not such a bad pilot myself! We don't have to sit here and listen to...
We can pay you two thousand now, plus fifteen, when we reach Alderaan.

edges.label: It's too late.
message: You should have paid him when you had the chance.
Jabba's put a price on your head so large every bounty hunter in the galaxy will be looking for you.
I'm lucky I found you first.

edges.label: Give it to me.
edges.message: If you give it to me, I might forget I found you.

edges.label: No
message: He has no time for smugglers who drop their shipments at the first sign of an Imperial cruiser.

edges.label: __Stay as Greedo__
message: You can tell that to Jabba.
He may only take your ship.

edges.label: That's the idea.
message: I've been looking forward to this for a long time...

edges.label: Bargain.
message: Han, my boy, I'm only doing this because you're the best and I need you.
